My Favorite Products for Allergies and Sensitivities

22 January 2019

Due to loads of health issues in the house, including asthma, allergies, eczema, and just wildly sensitive skin and sinuses I have spent the past seven years searching for the safest skin, hair, and cleaning products.

I refer to the EWG’s Skin Deep Database as often as possible and try to avoid artificial fragrances, gluten, sunflower seed and nut oils (except coconut), dairy, and too harsh chemicals. I’ve tried countless products, spent countless hours on research, and have gone through thousands of dollars to figure this all out and thought it would be neat to write up a post that I wish I had previously.

I’ve found that my local health food market has many of these items and while they are a bit more expensive than they would be online the local store guarantees all their products, so if something doesn’t work out it can be returned. I also use Thrive Market a lot.

Here’s a big ol’ list of products we have been using consistently for years. I hope it helps.

Face

Cleanser

  • Desert Essence Thoroughly Clean

Moisturizers

  • Adalou Naturals 1000 Roses Heavenly Night Cream
  • Mineral Fusion Intense Hydration Face Cream
  • Pure Jojoba Oil for lips

Makeup

  • Mineral Fusion Color Correcting Primer
  • Mineral Fusion Blush
  • Mineral Fusion Eye Shadow Trio
  • Mineral Fusion Liquid Concealer
  • Endlessly Beautiful mascara
  • Pure Jojoba Oil as makeup remover

Body

Moisturizers

  • The Seaweed Bath Company Body Cream
  • Borage Therapy Dry Skin Lotion
  • Nubian Heritage Coconut & Papaya Hand Cream
  • Honest Company Face + Body Lotion

Rash Care

  • Lemon Balm
  • WiseWays All Heal Salve

Soaps

  • Alaffia African Black Soap
  • Desert Essence Bar Soaps
  • Everyone Soap Sage & Verbena
  • The Honest Company Shampoo + Body Wash
  • Everyone Lavender Coconut Hand Soap
  • Nature Clean Liquid Hand Soap

Shaving

  • Kiss My Face Fragrance Free Shaving Cream
  • Louisiana Beard Oil
  • Alaffia African Black Soap

Deodorants

  • Earth Science Deodorant
  • Every Man Jack Deodorant

Sunblock

  • Blue Lizard Sensitive Skin Sunscreen SPF 30+
  • Nature’s Gate Sport Broad Spectrum SPF 50
  • Alba Botanica Fragrance Free Lotion SPF 45
  • Kiss My Face SPF stick

Bug Repellent

  • Nantucket Spider Extra Strength Tick
  • Bug Out! Citronella Spray

Pain Relief

  • White Egret Pure Magnesium Oil
  • Biofreeze Roll-On
  • Curamin Extra Strength

Hair

Shampoo

  • Shikai Tea Tree Shampoo
  • Andalou Naturals Lavender & Biotin Full Volume Shampoo

Conditioner

  • Earth Science Hair Masque
  • Andalou Naturals Lavender & Biotin Full Volume Conditioner
  • The Honest Company Conditioner

Leave In, Styling

  • Pacifica Hairvana Leave-On Detangling Conditioner
  • Alaffia Coconut Texturizing Spray

Mouth

  • Nature’s Gate Toothpaste
  • The Natural Dentist Cavity Zapper Kid’s Toothpaste
  • Desert Essence Tea Tree Oil Mouthwash
  • TheraBreath Oral Rinse
  • Dental Aid Activated Charcoal Powder

Laundry

  • Seventh Generation Free & Clear laundry powder
  • Wool dryer balls with essential oils

Cleaning

Sprays

  • Force of Nature disinfectant
  • Method Granite Cleaner
  • Method Stainless Steel Polish
  • ECOS Window Cleaner
  • Dr. Bronner’s Pure Castile Liquid Soap with water
  • Seventh Generation Wood Cleaner

Dishes

  • Seventh Generation Free & Clear liquid soap
  • ECOS Hypoallergenic Dish Soap, Free & Clear
  • Ecover Automatic Dishwasher Tablets
  • Seventh Generation Dishwasher Rinse Aid

Scrubs

  • Bon Ami Powder Cleanser

Air Freshener

  • Aura Cacia Room and Body Mist

There may be lots I have missed here so I will add them as I remember! If you want to chat about this at all feel free to reach out on Twitter 💜
